note.p: Hungarian-born German author and editor. Jewish Theological Seminary, Breslau (Wrocław), 1866–8. Studied modern philology and art history at the Universities of Vienna and Jena, receiving his doctorate in 1878. On the editorial staff of the Breslauer Nachrichten and Düsseldorfer Zeitung; an editor of Tribune (Berlin) and Deutsches Heim. Published on history, culture, and music.
